text: Rasmus may refer to: == People == * Rasmus (given name) * Rasmus (surname) == Arts and entertainment == * The Rasmus, a Finnish rock band formerly called Rasmus ** The Rasmus (album), a self-titled studio album by the Finnish band * the title character of Rasmus Klump, a Danish comic strip series * Rasmus, a character in books by Swedish author Astrid Lindgren ==See also== *Rasmussen ("Rasmus' Son"), family name derived from "Rasmus" *Erasmus (disambiguation) * *
title: Rasmus
